title: Sunday drives
creator_credit: Fiona Tinney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Fiona Tinney delves into the jigsaw of the past, the stories she heard while going on Sunday drives with the family. Even though she was not very interested at the time, these stories, melded with the towns they drove through have imprinted on her memory as Tinney tries to hold on to them.
creator_credit_for_label: Fiona Tinney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
